meanings.definition: In a stubborn or obstinate manner.
meanings.sent1: She pigheadedly refused to change her mind about the movie choice.
meanings.sent2: He walked pigheadedly towards the finish line, ignoring all distractions.
meanings.sent3: The cat stared pigheadedly at the closed door, waiting for it to magically open.
meanings.sent4: The old car chugged pigheadedly up the steep hill, refusing to give up.
meanings.sent5: The child tugged pigheadedly at the toy, determined to make it work.

meanings.sent1: Her pigheadedly stubborn attitude caused conflicts with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The pigheadedly ambitious entrepreneur never took no for an answer.
meanings.sent3: The pigheadedly optimistic squirrel believed it could fly with cardboard wings.
meanings.sent4: The pigheadedly competitive siblings raced each other to the top of the hill.
meanings.sent5: The pigheadedly loyal dog waited by the door for its owner to return.
